page.title: 02THE GOLDEN VALLEY HOTEL
page.content: The hotel was opened in{1973.}It has {50}full_time and{30}part_time staff.It has 99 bedrooms and at full capacity provides for{150 people.}The most expensive room is the double club room which costs{Â£90 per night,}compared with the average hotel room of{Â£12 per {night.}The hotel stands in six acres and is worth{Â£5,000,000.}In 1984 its total revenue was{Â£1,597,112.} There have been many famous people staying here including David Essex(pop star),Kevin Keegan(footballer),Jeremy Beadle(comedian) and the Crossroads cast,who used the hotel for programme purposes for 10 years. The hotel caters for business men and famillies alike,offering the following facilities,1 restuarant,covering 110 diners,2 bars,1 lounge and 3 function rooms.
